One wears a camouflage tank top and a baseball cap, and the other a black t-shirt.  They appear to be having a conversation. The scene cuts back to the men on the brown couch.  Bobby reappears, looking down. An image of a shirtless man with tattoos appears with text that reads "LAST TIME TATE DRUNK". The scene changes back to Bobby, who raises his eyebrows and speaks, looking directly at the camera.  Bobby closes his eyes and lowers his head slightly.
